SceneDescription.name: Endgame
SceneDescription.description:
Lord Borkus: "Ah, goodness. An assassin cleaning like a maid. That’s a good one. I haven’t gotten that good of a laugh in some time. Now, to get to work."
Assassin: "Work?"
Lord Borkus: "I’ll have to file the paperwork to give the maids their well-earned raises".
Assassin: [Are you f***ing KIDDING ME?!]
